Authors: Sasmoko, Indrianti Y., Widhoyoko S.A., Udjaja Y., Tanurwijaya A.
Title: Teacher Engagement Interventions through ITEI Apps
Source title: 2018 6th International Conference on Cyber and IT Service Management, CITSM 2018
Affiliations: Primary Teacher Education Department, Faculty of Humanities, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Research Interest Group in Educational Technology, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Faculty of Social, Podomoro University, Jakarta, Indonesia; Computer Science Department, School of Computer Science, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Authors with affiliations: Sasmoko, Primary Teacher Education Department, Faculty of Humanities, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia, Research Interest Group in Educational Technology, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Indrianti, Y., Research Interest Group in Educational Technology, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia, Faculty of Social, Podomoro University, Jakarta, Indonesia; Widhoyoko, S.A., Research Interest Group in Educational Technology, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia, Faculty of Social, Podomoro University, Jakarta, Indonesia; Udjaja, Y., Computer Science Department, School of Computer Science, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Tanurwijaya, A., Research Interest Group in Educational Technology, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Abstract: ITEI Apps is an android based application developed for being able to map the condition of teacher engagement through the concept of self-diagnostic. Self-diagnostic is done from the self-assessment stage to obtain profiling of teachers on the condition of engagement. The next stage is to intervene on the results so that teachers can do the improvement program engagement independently. This research uses exploratory research method as one part of Neuroresearch method. Overall this research produced an application with intervention design that is beneficial for the teacher so that with correct improvement program individually impact to the teacher become more engaged with its profession and ultimately able to improve performance impacting to education quality nationally. © 2018 IEEE.
Index Keywords: Education quality; Exploratory research; Improve performance; Neuroresearch; One parts; Self assessment; Self-diagnostics; Application programs
